title: Lowest Spreads Forex broker | IC Markets
meta: At IC Markets, we can offer market leading spreads in each of our platforms by providing Raw Pricing connectivity. Start Trading now!
icmarketsoffersvariablespreads: IC Markets offers variable spreads on our
forextradingplatformsweareabletooffer: forex trading platforms.  We are able to offer market leading spreads in each of our platforms by providing them with True ECN connectivity. Over 50 different banks and dark pool liquidity sources are pricing into our ECN at any given time to ensure our spreads remain tight and liquidity deep 24/7.
ourtypicalspreadsareillustratedow: Our typical spreads are illustrated below. Spreads can go as low as 0.0 pips on our MetaTrader and cTrader True ECN platforms.
spreads_2: IC Markets’ spreads are among the lowest across all major and minor currency pairs. In particular, our average EUR/USD spread of 0.1 pips is the lowest in the world.
spreads_14_1: The commission only applies to Forex and Metals and vary by trading account type.
spreads_21: cTrader commission is charged per side, per 100,000 USD traded. This is different to MT4 which charges a fixed amount per lot.
spreads_22: The commission charged on the cTrader platform is $3 USD per 100,000 USD traded. The USD commission amount is converted to the base currency of an account at the current spot rate. An example of the commission calculation on a cTrader account is below.
spreads_22e: The commission charged on the cTrader platform is €3 USD per 100,000 USD traded. The USD commission amount is converted to the base currency of an account at the current spot rate. An example of the commission calculation on a cTrader account is below.
